name: A Strange Encounter
paragraphs: You leave the hospital and start walking aimlessly, lost in your thoughts. You're so deep in thought that you don't notice when a man approaches you. He's wearing an oversized trench coat and a fedora, and he looks like he just stepped out of a 1920s detective story.
"Excuse me," the man says in a thick New York accent. "I couldn't help but notice that you look like you've got the weight of the world on your shoulders. Is everything okay?"

You look at him, stunned for a moment, before bursting into laughter. The absurdity of the situation hits you, and you can't help but find it funny. As you walk away, still chuckling to yourself, you realize that maybe things will be okay after all.
